danata dina pahaka pamana sita adahalena dharanipatha warshawa hethuwen athi wu jala galmen dompe, mahara ha biyagama pradeshiya lekam kottasawala eeye (21 wanida) dahawal wana wita awathan wuwange ganana daha dahas thunsiya paha dakwa ihala naga thibu athara biyagama pradeshaye ek maranayak da sidu wi atha.thawada me wana wita biyagakama kottasaye niwasa 16kata ha dompe kottasaye niwasa 07katada alabhahani sidu wi thibena athara dompe parakaduwulla pradeshaye pas kandak naya yama nisa ee awata pihiti niwasa thunaka padinchi 21 denaku ema niwasa walin iwath kirimata piyawara gath bawada dompe samaja sewa niladhari saman shriyarathna mahatha ‘dinamina’ ta kiya.me athara biyagama kottasaye awathan wuwan sandaha sahana kandawuru 04k pihituwa owunta pisu aahara nokadawama sapayimata katayuthu kara athayi ki biyagama samaja sanwardhana niladhari sumudu liyanage mahatha dan kalaniganga da pitara galimata patan gena thibena nisa biyagama kottasaye awathan wuwange ganana thawath ihala yamata ida athayi da kiya.danata jala galmen biyagama kottasaye grama sewa wasam 25ka pawul 2275ka 6488 denek da dompe kottasaye grama sewa wasam 169ka pawul 153 ka 581ka denek da awathan wi sitithi.
